nodes.text: Symbiosis was a mutually beneficial relationship between living things Such relationships were described as symbiotic, and the parties involved in the relationship were named symbionts. The Jedi sought symbiosis and balance between the lifeforms of the galaxy. Just as the Living Force fed into the Cosmic Force, midi-chlorians, microscopic organisms that originated from the Wellspring of Life, were symbionts with sentient beings.
Species in a symbiotic relationship could not live without the other, and would die without the partnership.

In the strictest sense, real-world "symbiosis" refers to any type of a close and long-term biological interaction between two different species, whether it benefits both parties (mutualism), benefits one party and is neutral to the other (commensalism), or whether it benefits one party to the detriment of the other (parasitism). However, in common usage, symbiosis specifically refers to mutualism. Symbiosis in the Star Wars universe refers to mutually beneficial relationships, i.e. mutualism.[source?]
